awd_titl_txt: Travel to Tenth IUPAC Conference on Physical Organic        Chemistry, Haifa, Israel, August 5-10, 1990
awd_abstract_narration: This grant in the Organic Dynamics Program will provide partial                 travel costs for approximately twenty U.S. scientists attending                 the Tenth IUPAC Conference on Physical Organic Chemistry, to be                 held in Haifa, Israel from August 5-10, 1990.                                                                                                                   Individual grants averaging $1,000 will be awarded to                           successful applicants (to be selected by a committee comprised                  of the Principal Investigator and the other two U.S. members of                 the organizing committee for the Conference).  The selection                    process will emphasize efforts to invite and assist the                         participation of women, underrepresented minorities, and                        younger chemists.  The IUPAC Conference on Physical Organic                     Chemistry traditionally has a broad scope, bringing together                    scientists from the diverse areas within physical organic                       chemistry.  This will foster interaction and collaborative                      research among members of the international scientific                          community.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Mathematical and Physical Sciences
